title: Patch 9
content: miliars.* Fixed a floating brain jar and some buggy viscous chairs on the nautiloid. A pillar on the nautiloid is no longer destructible. You can now interact with the plaques in the grove.* Fixed a forest tree causing the 'Can't see!' error when trying to move a boulder. You can now loot a chest at the Goblin Camp without turning all of Grymforge hostile. Fixed random bottles with missing text appearing in the Traveller's Chest after leaving a minicamp. You can now use the Adamantine Forge more
